description: The Material-Recycling Certificate marks the point in time, respectively status update at which an asset irrevocably enters a new status through transferring to an authorized business partner. In most cases the authorized partner is a shredder company and/or a recycler.

BpnlTrait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNL is composed of prefix 'BPNL', 10 digits and two uppercase letters.

Timestamp.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

UuidV4Trait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

Text.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

issuer.description: BPN of the business partner who creates this certificate

issueDate.description: This is the date when the certificate was issued.

catenaXId.description: The Catena-X ID of the given part (e.g. the assembly), valid for the Catena-X dataspace.

articleNumber.description: Unique identification assigned by the authorized company for internal referencing

vin.description: Vehicle Identification Number. Remark: this should be deducted from a reference to the vehicle TWIN

RecyclingStrategyCertificateCharacterist.description: Describes the characteristic of Recycling strategy certificate

certificate.description: A property of the model, named certificate.
